info.description: Customer API for FTM and CIMS
info.title: Customer accessible API

get.description: Fetches information about a customer the account has access too

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The id of the customer to retrieve
parameters.shortDesc: The id of the customer to retrieve

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)
parameters.shortDesc: How many items to return at one time (max 100)

200.description: A paged array of work requests

allOf.description: A request to create a workorder

work_request_id.description: The Id of the template to follow

requestor.description: Work Request Submission submitter user name

approved_by.description: User that approved the Work Request Submission

approved_dt.description: Date the Work Request Submission was approved

data_count.description: count of work request submission name/value records

data.description: array of Work Request Submission name/value records

name.description: The name of the work request property to set

value.description: the value to set to the property

type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

signedToken.description:
To Generate an API Follow these steps:
 1. concatenate KEY + URL + REQUEST BODY
 1. create SHA512 hash of step 1 string
 1. concatenate USER + ":" + SHA512 hash
 1. base64 encode string from step 3
 1. Pass in as a Bearer token
signedToken.name: Authorization
